data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "**High-Value Item:** $2,000 laptop delivery requires signature. Driver scans package, confirms recipient ID, captures signature on device. "Signature required" satisfied. Insurance requirement met.". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
